attributes.action: Stop unnecessary cosmetic surgery on the NHS
attributes.additional_details:
People like Josie Cunningham for example that blag free boob jobs and procedures like that etc for purely cosmetic reasons and are draining the already overstretched NHS should be stopped! 

Cosmetic surgery such as this should be paid for by the person NOT the taxpayer - the funding should be put towards things such as saving people’s lives, providing more equipment for sick people etc!
attributes.background: Stop people having cosmetic surgery on the NHS unnecessarily, unless it’s for medical reasons (not mental health), or due to trauma or a condition not because someone just doesn’t like a part of their body! The NHS is massively overstretched as it is and is already struggling with funds.

rejection.details:
Cosmetic surgery is not routinely provided on the NHS. Occasionally, it may be provided on the NHS for psychological or other health reasons.

You can find out more here:

https://www.nhs.uk/Conditions/cosmetic-treatments-guide/Pages/is-cosmetic-surgery-available-on-the-NHS.aspx
